column5: ALK Added another 3k here at 6084 so long 15k now Holding the 17k long UAL as well both stocks going to run hard and top 100 within 15 months imo While these two are investment and taxation on them matters to me ie pushing off what will be a very large gain gain into 2020 at the earliest just reloaded 11k DAL at 5490 this morning as trade 22 on DAL so far this yr Playing for 58 but as group takes off is that fun or what likely will stay in for 60Shorting any of these three dumb unless one wants to generate capital losses LOL
